net.jnellis.binpack.packing

Interface PackingPolicy<P extends Comparable<P>,C extends Comparable<C>,B extends Bin<P,C>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlmostWorstFit, BestFit, FirstFit, LastFit, NextFit, WorstFit
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PackingPolicy<P extends Comparable<P>,C extends Comparable<C>,B extends Bin<P,C>>
    A packing algorithm that attempts to find a bin that can fit a piece from a list of bins.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Predicate<B> binsThatCanFit(P piece)
      Creates a predicate for bins that can fit this particular piece.
      Optional<B> chooseBin(P piece, List<B> existingBins)
      Chooses a bin that will fit the piece from a list of bins.
      static <B> Stream<B> reverseStream(List<B> bins)
      Creates a stream that traverses the given list in reverse order.

    • Method Detail

      • reverseStream

        static <B> Stream<B> reverseStream(List<B> bins)
        Creates a stream that traverses the given list in reverse order. The given list, bins, should extend RandomAccess for best performance.
        Type Parameters:
        B - meant to be a bin type but can be any object.
        Parameters:
        bins - List of existing bins.
        Returns:
        A stream that traverses the given list in reverse order.

      • chooseBin

        Optional<B> chooseBin(P piece,
                      List<B> existingBins)
        Chooses a bin that will fit the piece from a list of bins.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to be fitted into an existing bin.
        existingBins - List of existing bins where the piece could fit.
        Returns:
        Returns an Optional bin that represents the bin it found, or not.

      • binsThatCanFit

        default Predicate<B> binsThatCanFit(P piece)
        Creates a predicate for bins that can fit this particular piece.

        Usage: 

           collection.stream()
             .filter(binsThatCanFit(piece);
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece that will be packed next.
        Returns:
        Predicate for checking if a bin fits the given piece.
